languages.text: "Старая Здена. Отверженная Здена. Безумная Здена. Здена-беда. Здена-проклятие. Здена Неприкасаемая". {n}Женщина обхватывает плечи руками и начинает хохотать. На тонких запястьях и шее звякают оборванные цепи.{/n} "Призрак прошлого? Тень настоящего? Лишь Неумирающий знает. Лишь Он..."

"Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."
languages.original_text: "Старая Здена. Отверженная Здена. Безумная Здена. Здена-беда. Здена-проклятие. Здена Неприкасаемая". {n}Женщина обхватывает плечи руками и начинает хохотать. На тонких запястьях и шее звякают оборванные цепи.{/n} "Призрак прошлого? Тень настоящего? Лишь Неумирающий знает. Лишь Он..."

traits.locale_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the outcast. Zdena the outcast. Zdena the disaster. Zdena the curse. Zdena the Untouchable." {n}The woman grabs her shoulders with her hands and starts laughing loudly. Torn chains clink on her thin wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. Only He..."

"Old Zdena. Zdena the outcast. Zdena the outcast. Zdena the disaster. Zdena the curse. Zdena the Untouchable." {n}The woman grabs her shoulders with her hands and starts laughing loudly. Torn chains clink on her thin wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. Only He..."

languages.text: «La vieja Zdena. Zdena la Paria. Zdena la Loca. Zdena el Desastre. Zdena la Maldita. Zdena la Rechazada». {n}La mujer se lleva los brazos al pecho y empieza a reírse a carcajadas. Unas cadenas rotas tintinean en sus muñecas y cuello demacrados.{/n} «¿Un fantasma del pasado? ¿Una sombra del presente? Solo el Inmortal lo sabe. Solo Él...».
languages.original_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."

traits.locale_text: «La vieja Zdena. Zdena la Paria. Zdena la Loca. Zdena el Desastre. Zdena la Maldita. Zdena la Rechazada». {n}La mujer se lleva los brazos al pecho y empieza a reírse a carcajadas. Unas cadenas rotas tintinean en sus muñecas y cuello demacrados.{/n} «¿Un fantasma del pasado? ¿Una sombra del presente? Solo el Inmortal lo sabe. Solo Él...».

languages.text: 「老婆ズデナ。追放者ズデナ。気狂いのズデナ。災厄のズデナ。呪いのズデナ。見捨てられたズデナ」{n}女は両腕を胸に抱き、大声でキャッキャと笑い始める。彼女のやせ細った手首と首で、引き千切られた鎖が音を立てる。{/n}「過去の亡霊？現在の影？不死の者だけが知っている。主のみが…」
languages.original_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."

traits.locale_text: 「老婆ズデナ。追放者ズデナ。気狂いのズデナ。災厄のズデナ。呪いのズデナ。見捨てられたズデナ」{n}女は両腕を胸に抱き、大声でキャッキャと笑い始める。彼女のやせ細った手首と首で、引き千切られた鎖が音を立てる。{/n}「過去の亡霊？現在の影？不死の者だけが知っている。主のみが…」

languages.text: “老兹迪娜，弃民兹迪娜、疯狂的兹迪娜、灾祸之人兹迪娜、被诅咒的兹迪娜、被唾弃的兹迪娜。”{n}女人将双臂环在胸前，咯咯大笑起来，断掉的锁链在她瘦弱的手腕和脖子上叮当作响。{/n}“是过去的鬼魂？还是现世的阴影？只有不死之神知道答案，只有祂才知道……”
languages.original_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."

languages.text: "Die alte Zdena. Zdena, die Ausgestoßene. Zdena, die Wahnsinnige. Zdena, die Katastrophe. Zdena, der Fluch. Zdena, die Verabscheute." {n}Die Frau legt die Arme auf ihre Brust und kichert laut. An ihren dürren Handgelenken und am Hals klirren kaputte Ketten.{/n} "Ein Geist der Vergangenheit? Ein Schatten der Gegenwart? Nur der Todlose weiß das. Nur er ..."
languages.original_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."

traits.locale_text: "Die alte Zdena. Zdena, die Ausgestoßene. Zdena, die Wahnsinnige. Zdena, die Katastrophe. Zdena, der Fluch. Zdena, die Verabscheute." Die Frau legt die Arme auf ihre Brust und kichert laut. An ihren dürren Handgelenken und am Hals klirren kaputte Ketten.{/n} "Ein Geist der Vergangenheit? Ein Schatten der Gegenwart? Nur der Todlose weiß das. Nur er ..."

languages.text: « La vieille Zdena. Zdena la paria. Zdena la folle. Zdena la catastrophe. Zdena la maudite. Zdena la rejetée. » {n}La femme éclate bruyamment de rire en serrant son propre torse, faisant s'entrechoquer les chaînes brisées qui pendent à ses poignets squelettiques et à son cou émacié.{/n} « Un fantôme du passé ? Une ombre du présent ? Seul l'Immortel le sait. Lui seul... »
languages.original_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."

languages.text: "İhtiyar Zdena. Yurtsuz Zdena. Deli Zdena. Musibet Zdena. Lanetli Zdena. Reddedilen Zdena." {n}Kadın, kollarını göğsünün üzerinde birleştirerek yüksek sesle kıkırdamaya başlıyor. Zayıf düşmüş bilekleriyle boynundaki kırık zincirler tıkırdıyor.{/n} "Geçmişten gelen bir hayalet mi bu? Zamanımıza düşen bir gölge mi yoksa? Bir tek Ölmeyen bilir. Yalnızca o..."
languages.original_text: "Old Zdena. Zdena the Outcast. Zdena the Mad. Zdena the Disaster. Zdena the Curse. Zdena the Spurned." {n}The woman hugs her arms to her chest and starts cackling loudly. Broken chains clink at her emaciated wrists and neck.{/n} "A ghost of the past? A shadow of the present? Only the Undying One knows. He alone..."
